author: Simon Difford
description: Spritz a chilled glass with Islay whisky (Kaiko used Laphroaig) and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into spritzed glass. Special ingredient #1: Rejuvenated grenadine* Rejuvenated grenadine300g pomegranate juice150g granulated sugar30g maraska syrup (from jar of maraschino cherries)60g beet vinegar (from jar of pickled beetroot)60g oxidised grenache red wine1 barspoon rosewater¼ vanilla pod4 pinch ground allspice (~1g)6g carob molassesPlace all ingredients in a jar and shake until the sugar is dissolved. Remove the vanilla pod after approx 1hr. Special ingredient #2: Citric lime oleo-saccharum100ml 1:1 lime oleo10ml 10% citric acid solution
name: Jack Rising

recipeInstructions.text: Spritz a chilled glass with Islay whisky (Kaiko used Laphroaig) and set aside
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into spritzed glass
30g maraska syrup (from jar of maraschino cherries)
60g beet vinegar (from jar of pickled beetroot)
Place all ingredients in a jar and shake until the sugar is dissolved
Remove the vanilla pod after approx 1hr

video.description:
Spritz a chilled glass with Islay whisky (Kaiko used Laphroaig) and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into spritzed glass.

Special ingredient #1: Rejuvenated grenadine
* Rejuvenated grenadine
300g pomegranate juice
150g granulated sugar
30g maraska syrup (from jar of maraschino cherries)
60g beet vinegar (from jar of pickled beetroot)
60g oxidised grenache red wine
1 barspoon rosewater
¼ vanilla pod
4 pinch ground allspice (~1g)
6g carob molasses
Place all ingredients in a jar and shake until the sugar is dissolved. Remove the vanilla pod after approx 1hr.

Special ingredient #2: Citric lime oleo-saccharum
100ml 1:1 lime oleo
10ml 10% citric acid solution
video.name: HOWTO make Jack Rising
